wikipedia_page.main: John William Joyce (26 June 1877 – June 1956) was an English footballer who played as a goalkeeper for various clubs between 1898 and 1920. Throughout his career, he was known to supporters as "Tiny" in allusion to his size, being 6 feet (1.8 m)  tall and weighing over 14 stone (90 kg).

response: *John Joyce (New Zealand politician) (1839–1899), New Zealand politician
